title: NEL stations closure between HarbourFront and Dhoby Ghaut

updates.text: NEL stations between NE1 HarbourFront & NE6 Dhoby Ghaut will close at about 11pm this Fri & Sat, 23 & 24 Apr. Shuttle 22 will serve these stations. NEL service between NE6 Dhoby Ghaut & NE17 Punggol, Sengkang-Punggol LRT services as well as Services 315 & 325 will also run later. https://t.co/cVQZAiyYOf
